```{python}
import pyddm
from pyddm import Model, Fittable, Overlay, Bound, DDM, Sample

class MyDDM(Model):
    # 定义模型的参数
    v = Fittable(minval=0, maxval=5)  # 决策偏倚参数v
    z = Fittable(minval=0, maxval=1)  # 起始点参数z
model = MyDDM()
overlay = Overlay(DDM(model=model, dt=0.001))

# 假设你的数据集保存在名为"data.csv"的CSV文件中
data = pyddm.data.loader.load_csv_data("data.csv")

# 创建样本对象
sample = Sample.from_pandas_dataframe(data, rt_column=["rt_sec", "rt_ms"], correct_column="acc")

```
